text: Hello
Hi there
I want to tell you about Save the Children organisation
Tell me more
So this is charity organisation where you can sponsor a child in a country you choose
what do they do for the children?

All across the globe, children are dying from preventable causes, missing out on education due to poverty or gender, suffering from violence, exploitation and neglect, and are vulnerable in times of crisis. In every corner of the world, children need a strong voice to stand up for them, work on their behalf and make their lives better.
what percentage of donations actually go to help the children vs. administrative expenses?
In fiscal year 2017, 86% of all expenditures went to program service.8% to fundraising and 5% for administrative expenses
that is a pretty good ratio but i would rather see more than 90 percent go directly to help the children
Agree,the more money goes to children the better.
how do they decide which children to help?
You can choose yourself which one to help,there is something like catalog on their website.Where you choose which children to sponsor.
how much is the average donation?
i don't know,in this hit we can donate some part of our payment to this charity.Starting from 0 to $2.
how much are you going to donate?
I think i will donate around 30-50c
i was thinking 25 c but maybe more.
Honestly i dont think even if we donate by $2 dollars each it will really help anyone.So i will donate 50 cents.
you are probably right but i need to do more research on this charity.  there are many charity scams out there and I have been burned in the past.
